# api.livereload.com
LiveReload server-side API, the new version (in Go)


## Paddle endpoint

Example POST request:

    {
      "token": "scy9Rirp8In5O9frydd0",
      "txn": "595eb2a550f50aa2c093608ba070e0fa",
      "name": "Test User",
      "email": "57fb5121a477c@blackhole.io",
      "message": "fa5a7670d71a0eeb1fdac82ce6f58a10",
      "p_price": "10",
      "p_coupon": "",
      "quantity": "1",
      "p_country": "US",
      "p_currency": "USD",
      "p_earnings": "{\"128\":\"9.0000\"}",
      "p_order_id": "922738",
      "p_quantity": "1",
      "p_signature": "",
      "passthrough": "Example passthrough",
      "p_paddle_fee": "1",
      "p_product_id": "489469",
      "p_sale_gross": "10",
      "p_tax_amount": "0",
      "p_coupon_savings": "0",
      "p_used_price_override": "1"
    }
